introduction: Today we'll uncover the history behind how 2b2t's RAREST Item Was Found, against all odds with some

vocabulary.definition: to regulate access to something, often based on certain criteria
vocabulary.example: The group formed a cult to gatekeep the rare item from other players.

vocabulary.definition: taking effect from a date in the past
vocabulary.example: The new game update retroactively added missing features to old save files.

vocabulary.definition: limited to a specific individual or group
vocabulary.example: The club is exclusive and only allows members who meet certain qualifications.

vocabulary.definition: a cultural group within a larger culture, often having beliefs or interests at variance with those of the larger culture
vocabulary.example: The gamers formed a subculture dedicated to preserving rare in-game items.

vocabulary.definition: the process of introducing someone to a new job, skill, or belief
vocabulary.example: New members had to go through a secret induction ceremony to join the group.

vocabulary.definition: subjected to grief or harassment in an online game
vocabulary.example: The player's base was constantly griefed by other users in the game.
